About:
___

The Bhagavad Gita is universally renowned as the jewel of India's spiritual wisdom. Spoken by Lord Krishna, the Supreme Personality of Godhead to His intimate disciple Arjuna, the Gita's seven hundred concise verses provide a definitive guide to the science of self realization. 

No other philosophical or religious work reveals, in such a lucid and profound way, the nature of consciousness, the self, the universe and the Supreme.

___

Bhagavad Gita As It Is By  A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada - Audio Book

Mahabharta In Images - Image Collection
